name: A Solitary Android
description:
Ministry of Automated Defense Release notes

##COMBAT AI UPLINK PROTOCOL VERSION 16.12.9##

CHANGELOG:

FEATURE: In accordance with new legal requirements, android decisoning is now subject to civilian review. This change to the uplink protocol prompts all combat ai to markup field logs with explicit decisioning points for ethical review.

BUGFIX: AI uplink speed improved when downloading from active combat zones.

BUGFIX: No longer crashes when ingesting AI not patched from before 2.1.8.

written by Philip Hickey, Music By Josh Reichental
